item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Jon Hopkins - Music for Psychedelic Therapy Dolby Atmos [E-AC-3 JOC 768kbps 16bit/48kHz]
item.description:
Jon Hopkins - Music For Psychedelic Therapy

Released: 12 November 2021
Genre: Electronic, Ambient
Source: Apple Music Rip



I requested this along with a few other albums and while waiting i managed to teach myself how to rip apple music in atmos and decided to give back to the community which helped me find a few albums in atmos i could not rip myself from tidal or find on soulseek. Cheers to sharing!

I Found this artist/album while searching literally "best albums in dolby atmos". I have been an avid surround sound music collector for years now. Until recently i thought the only worthwhile avenue was bluray audio, dvd audio and SACD official releases or repacks based off the tracks from those. I even had a stint many many years ago where i was making AVCHD's for a group related to ps3 bluray releases. I focused on making high definition audio surround sound releases because at the time that was the only way i knew how to play digitally obtained audio correctly to my home theater setup (AVR with 7.2 and DTSHD and TrueHD capability, which i still use to this day - hoping someday to convert it into an atmos or auro 3d setup.

Recently i discovered that there was a significant amount more of surround sound music available and after doing some research i came to learn about music streaming services with dolby atmos music. It was like discovering bluray/dvd audio/sacd rips all over again... Time to start using my home theater again more for music than movies! I have a month of apple music free to get as much as i can. I welcome any suggestions on top notch albums which are currently not available for free.

Anyways the album is super groovy, it actually very much aligns with my fairly wide taste in music and my preferred "genre of intoxicating substances". I can vouch that this album is literally what it is titled... Music for psychedelic therapy! and until today i was making do with a high resolution stereo rip of this album using my AVRs neo dts upmixer and quite enjoying it. Well after successfully ripping my first atmos release from apple i promptly set my self up for a conveniently brief psychedelic experience (k-hole) and finally got my therapy in surround sound. Top notch!

I hope you all enjoy! I will post a few more of the rips i had been seeking for over a month now which had either neve been on tidal or expired on there... And that nobody with knowledge to rip atmos has done since this album was available. I would encourage everyone who appreciates a good surround sound music experience give this album a try regardless of their taste in music... I went in blind based off this album coming up in numerous reddit posts related to the search "best dolby atmos albums/songs". And now i am paying it forward with the link to experience it yourself.

1. "Welcome" Jon Hopkins, 7Rays 6:22
2. "Tayos Caves, Ecuador i" 6:15
3. "Tayos Caves, Ecuador ii" 5:07
4. "Tayos Caves, Ecuador iii" 7:39
5. "Love Flows Over Us in Prismatic Waves" 6:52
6. "Deep in the Glowing Heart" 8:51
7. "Ascending, Dawn Sky" Hopkins, 7Rays 9:22
8. "Arriving" Hopkins, 7Rays 4:35
9. "Sit Around the Fire" Hopkins, East Forest, Ram Dass

item.title: 【Music Videos】30 SECONDS TO MARS: A Beautiful Lie 2.0 | Rare Music Video |
item.description:
This is a second version of the music video for A Beautiful Lie by 30 Seconds to Mars, titled "A Beautiful Lie 2.0" where texts appear throughout the video.
It's a very difficult video to find, however I found this one, but the image is very bad and it even has extra subtitles.
If anyone has this video, can you please send it to me.
Thanks!!!
item.author: Tadeulife
